Public MustInherit Class SelectionGlyph Inherits DesignerGlyph

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 當在工作流程設計介面上選取 時，提供其所顯示之所有圖像 (Glyph) 類別的方法和屬性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties for all glyph classes that an displays when it is selected on the workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 使用者可以選取顯示在活動設計工具上的某些圖像，但有些則不行。Some glyphs that are displayed on an activity designer can be selected by the user while others cannot. 當使用者選取了可以選取的圖像時，圖像會變更其在活動設計介面上的外觀。When a user selects a glyph that can be selected, the glyph changes appearance on the activity design surface. 類別是所有圖像類別的基底類別 (Base Class)，這些活動設計介面上的圖像類別會在使用者選取時變更外觀。The class is the base class for all glyph classes that change appearance when a user selects it on the activity design surface.

para.span: 當您從 繼承時，必須覆寫下列成員：。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following member: .

summary.span: 傳回矩形陣列，表示選取圖像的抓取控點。

span.span: Returns an array of rectangles that represents the selected glyph's grab handles.

returns.span: 要在選取圖像上顯示之抓取控點的 陣列。

span.span: A array of the grab handles to display on the selected glyph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抓取控點就是選取圖像邊緣上的小方塊，使用者可以抓取並移動這個小方塊，以拖曳或調整圖像的大小。Grab handles are the small boxes on the edge of a selected glyph that a user can grab and move to drag or resize the glyph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可繪製使用者選取的所有圖像項目，包括圖像抓取控點。 draws all elements of the glyph that the user selects, including the glyphs grab handles.
